entry.summary: Re which they'll start distributing to vault users. Before you deposit make sure you understand the strategies involved and what market views you implicitly express by depositing. E.g Covered Call vault does well in bear, crab market or slow grind up but loses $ETH in sudden jump

entry.title: Another way to get your hands on some $OP tokens is to trade binary options on @thalesmarket. Make simple directional bets by buying $UP or $DOWN toke...
entry.summary: Another way to get your hands on some $OP tokens is to trade binary options on @thalesmarket. Make simple directional bets by buying $UP or $DOWN tokens. Every 14 days: - 11,000 OP + 20,000 THALES split between UP buyers - 11,000 OP + 20,000 THALES split between DOWN buyers
